siteMetadata.title: Reiko for PCC
siteMetadata.description: I am an experienced school administrator, an advocate for justice, and a collaborator. As the next Portland Community College board director for Zone 7, I will ensure that PCC advances diversity, equity, and inclusion.
siteMetadata.author: Reiko4PCC
siteMetadata.keywords: Reiko Mia Williams, Reiko For PCC, Reiko, Reiko4PCC, Portland Community College, Zone 7, PCC Zone 7
